annotation:
(a) 5 - I definitely keep my thoughts to myself.
(b) 1 - Noticing weak points requires paying attention to people more than I care to.
(c) 5 - I do things, but not necessarily carefully or completely.
(d) 1 - I'm not emotion-driven. Sadness and depression are foreign to me.
(e) 5 - Original ideas? I don't care for them. I like to stick with what I know.
(f) 1 - Again, I keep my thoughts to myself.
(g) 5 - Helpful? Not me.
(h) 1 - Careless? Probably.
(i) 1 - I handle stress fine. It's other people's stress I can't stand.
(j) 5 - Curiosity? Not my thing.
(k) 5 - Energy? Only when I need it.
(l) 1 - I don't start arguments, I just finish them.
(m) 5 - Hard worker? No, thanks.
(n) 1 - I'm not tense. Just ask me.
(o) 1 - I think a lot, but I wouldn't say I'm clever.
(p) 5 - I don't make things exciting. That requires effort.
(q) 5 - Forgive easily? No way.
(r) 1 - Organized? I don't care for that.
(s) 1 - I don't worry. I just don't care.
(t) 5 - Imagination? Not my thing.
(u) 1 - I'm quiet, yes.
(v) 5 - Trust people? No, thanks.
(w) 1 - Lazy? Probably.
(x) 1 - I don't get upset easily, no.
(y) 5 - Creative and inventive? Not my style.
(z) 1 - Strong personality? I just don't care.
(aa) 1 - Cold and distant? That's me.
(ab) 5 - Keep working until things are done? No, thanks.
(ac) 1 - Moody? I don't have moods.
(ad) 5 - Artistic and creative experiences? Not interested.
(ae) 1 - Shy? No, I just don't like people.
(af) 5 - Kind and considerate? Not me.
(ag) 5 - Quickly and carefully? I don't bother.
(ah) 1 - Staying calm in difficult situations is not a problem for me.
(ai) 1 - I don't care what kind of work it is.
(aj) 5 - Outgoing? No way.
(ak) 1 - Rude? If the shoe fits.
(al) 5 - Make plans? No, thanks.
(am) 1 - I don't get nervous.
(an) 5 - Play with ideas? That's effort.
(ao) 1 - I don't care for artistic things.
(ap) 5 - Cooperate? Not my style.
(aq) 1 - Paying attention? Not really.
(ar) 5 - Know a lot about art, music, and books? No, thanks.
